keywords: ['rock opera', 'male vocal', 'dramatic singing', 'choir', 'piano', 'electric guitar', 'bass guitar', 'acoustic drums', 'rising pattern', 'vibrant', 'energetic']
caption: This is a rock opera piece. There is a male vocalist singing passionately with a choir of backing vocals. The piano plays the main theme with the electric guitar while a bass guitar plays in the background. The rhythmic background is provided by the acoustic drums playing a simple rock beat. There is an energetic atmosphere to the piece. This piece could be used at sports venues. It could also be playing in the background of a bar.
